sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import {Avatar, Grid, Card, CardContent,CardActions, List, ListItemText, Typography, Button, CardHeader } from '@material-ui/core' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles' import ShoppingCartIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ShoppingCart' const useStyles = makeStyles({ root: { }, card: { width:'100%' }, cardHeader:{ fontSize: '40px', textAlign:'center' }, cardContent:{ // textAlign:"center", // alignItems:'center' } }) function Cart(){ const classes = useStyles() return( <> } > Total: 1000 coins ) } export default Cart;
